page.title: 20Community Schools
page.content: Noose Lane School is in its first year as a community school. The facilities of more Walsall schools are being used by the local community. At Noose Lane there is a Community Director who looks after this and the Portobello site A newsletter called'Park Review' is produced every term to advertise events. There is a Community Association to help.At Portobello there is a drop in centre for the unemployed. There is also badminton,ladies keep fit,craft club,coffee mornings, pensioners club, over 50 club, tap dancing,car maintenance, karate,adult literacy classes, sewing, yoga. For the children there is gymnastics, Brownies,pathfinders, drama club, marching band, teddy bear club,day visits in the holidasy.
